html:
In what could be considered a surprise, Canon USA has launched a new rebate program on select cameras and lenses. The rebates cover some of the older RF mount lenses and likely a few with overstock at retailers.

There is still going to be price increases in the USA before the end of April, which in turn may raise the MSRP on the products from the new instant rebate program.

Canon USA Instant Rebates

  • Canon EOS R6 Mark II $1899 B&H Photo / Amazon
  • Canon EOS R5 Mark II $3999 B&H Photo / Amazon
    • B&H Photo is including a Canon BG-R20 for free
  • Canon RF 15-35mm f/2.8L IS USM $2099 B&H Photo / Amazon
  • Canon RF 28-70mm f/2L USM $2799 B&H Photo / Amazon
  • Canon RF 35mm f/1.4L VCM $1399 B&H Photo / Amazon
  • Canon RF 70-200mm f/2.8L IS USM $2499 B&H Photo / Amazon
  • Canon RF 85mm f/1.2L USM DS $2899 B&H Photo / Amazon
  • Canon RF 100-500mm f/4.5-7.1L IS USM $2599 B&H Photo / Amazon
  • Canon RF 135mm f/1.8L IS USM $1899 B&H Photo / Amazon

We’re not surprised by another price drop on the Canon EOS R6 Mark II. They will be trying to move existing inventory as best as they can before the Canon EOS R6 Mark III is announced.

We still believe that announcement will come before July.
